posts.post_content:
I am starting to sell a small accumulation of T207 and starting off with five raw cards.  They are

Bresnahan - $30
Coulson - $20
Ferry - $15
Fromme -$15
Strunk - $25

Postage and Delivery Confirmation are extra and will be approximately $3.00 for a padded mailer based on what I paid today to ship similar parcels.  If intersted please email me at [url]rnovak14@wi.rr.com[/url].  I am open to offers.

Graded cards to follow including including a Weaver and other tough backs.

I'm looking for the following T207s. Bauman, Delahanty, Moriarity, Mullins with and without D on cap, Strange and Works.  Either raw or graded will work.  Looking for cards in VG to Ex range.  Please let me know if you can help.  Thanks, John
